DOC.brief_summary: The eyelid warming device design relieve symptom dysfunction glands eyelids Phase I , prospective , comparative study , investigator mask , monocentric Objectives To assess compare warm moisture Blephasteam® device versus warm moisture warm moist compress . To assess compare safety ocular surface 10 minute Blephasteam® application versus 10 minute warm moist compress application
DOC.brief_title: Warming Efficiency Warm Compresses Versus BLEPHASTEAM® Eyelid Therapy
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 80 year old . Healthy volunteer . For contact lens wearer , must wear hydrogel contact lens ( worn least 3 time per week ) Normal ocular examination eye .
